original_text: Many other people also travelled with them. They had a very large number of sheep, goats and cows.
korean_text: 수많은 잡족과 양과 소와 심히 많은 가축이 그들과 함께 하였으며

sentences.original_text: Many other people also travelled with them
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 많은 사람들도 그들과 함께 여행했습니다

sentences.original_text: They had a very large number of sheep
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 아주 많은 양을 가지고 있었습니다
